document_data.mainbody:
he Towers of Fury was a temple complex in Calimport dedicated to the worship of the Gods of Fury.
The Towers of Fury was located in the the eastern half of Samilar Drudach, part of Evyrtaan Sabban of Faiths Ward, in Calimport.
The Towers of Fury consisted of four towers, each five-stories tall. The complex was surrounded by the wall that shared sides with the drudach walls.
The Towers of Fury was constructed in the , by Syl-Pasha Rashid el Djenispool after centuries of previous temples being destroyed by the irritation of either gods or mortals.
